```{r}
library(readr)
opioid <- read_csv("~/SSmimic/Medication/opioid.csv")
cohort <- read_csv("~/SSmimic/Cohort/cohort.csv")

table<- merge(cohort,opioid, "subject_id")
table2<- table[!(is.na(table$max_pain) | table$max_pain=="0"), ]
finaltable<-table2[!(is.na(table2$med.pain) | table2$med.pain=="0"), ]
write.csv(finaltable,file = "finaltable.csv")
```
